    • Method Detail

      • simulateObservation

        public boolean simulateObservation(java.lang.String observingNodeID,
                          java.lang.String observedNodeID,
                          double score)
                            throws DSMException
        Create an observation by an observing node of another observed node. The observation is sent to the observing node and processed as if it were a local observation of the given observed node.
        Parameters:
        observingNodeID - the observation will be sent to this node which then processes as if it was an observation it made.
        observedNodeID - the node that was observed and for which the opinion score applies.
        score - opinion score, between -1 and 1.
        Throws:
        DSMException

      • resetObservations

        public void resetObservations(java.lang.String... observingNodeIDs)
                       throws DSMException
        Reset/remove the observations on the given list of nodes or all nodes if no list given.
        Parameters:
        observingNodeIDs - null or an array of nodes ids. If not null, then for each node id, reset the observations on that node. If null, the reset observations on all nodes.
        Throws:
        DSMException
